QuestData.Title: Ashes Of The Past
QuestData.Description: The ogres are a plague upon my kind. They summon my kin and force them into servitude, working them without rest till their heat fades away and they crumble into dust.$b$bTheir ashes must return to the lava flows so that they can be reborn!$b$bThe Ogres keep the dust in pouches on their person thinking it would enhance their strength. Go slay them and recover the ashes of my people!
QuestData.LogDescription: Molthron within the Bloodmaul Territory wants you to bring him $1oa Piles of Elemental Ash.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you flesh creature. In the lava the ashes will mix and the cycle shall continue as it has ever since the beginning.
